rooms.description: Main living area with ample natural light and ventilation. Uses eco-friendly materials.
Sole bedroom with a spacious balcony for natural light and ventilation. Vastu compliant orientation.
Compact dining area integrated with the living space for a seamless flow.
Small yet functional kitchen utilizing energy-efficient appliances and recycled materials.
Compact bathroom with water-saving fixtures designed for efficiency.

openings.description: Entryway aligned per Vastu principles, promoting positive energy flow.
Large balcony window allowing natural light and ventilation, oriented east for maximum sunlight in the morning.
Skylight to maximize daylight and enhance eco-friendly design.

garden_area.description: Large garden space with native flora promoting sustainability and natural cooling.

budget_considerations.description: Cost-effective design choices and locally sourced eco-friendly materials to stay within a tight budget.
